nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Dr. Person1 reviewed- she wants to continue holding the aldactone and restrict his water into to 1 Liter a day...  (how much water has he been drinking in 24hours) then repeat all same tests on MM/DD/YYYY... the earlier the better so we get results before end of day.. please confirm you received this.
